  • Uses of TrackerCluster in io.fluxcapacitor.common.tracking

    Methods in io.fluxcapacitor.common.tracking that return TrackerCluster
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TrackerCluster
    TrackerCluster.purgeCeasedTrackers(Instant threshold)
    Removes trackers that have not sent activity after the given timestamp.
    TrackerCluster
    TrackerCluster.purgeTrackers(Predicate<Tracker> predicate)
    Removes all trackers that match the provided predicate.
    TrackerCluster
    TrackerCluster.withActiveTracker(Tracker tracker)
    Marks the given tracker as actively processing messages.
    TrackerCluster
    TrackerCluster.withoutTracker(Tracker tracker)
    Removes the tracker from the cluster.
    TrackerCluster
    TrackerCluster.withWaitingTracker(Tracker tracker)
    Adds or updates the tracker as waiting (not currently processing).
